effect.Name: VHS (Texture)
effect.description: This shader simulates the analog image from VHS tapes. Special thanks to JargeZ, rgm89git, SergeyMC9730, zhuker, and constanton for the "ntscqt" project (https://github.com/JargeZ/ntscqt).
effect.author: Foxioo, JargeZ, rgm89git, SergeyMC9730, zhuker, constanton

parameter.name: /* Foxioo VHS (Texture) Shader | 1.0 (06.09.2025) */
parameter.description: This shader simulates the analog image from VHS tapes. Special thanks to JargeZ, rgm89git, SergeyMC9730, zhuker, and constanton for the "ntscqt" project (https://github.com/JargeZ/ntscqt).

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Ringing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for Ringing visibility.

parameter.name: Rainbow Frequency
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the frequency of rainbows.

parameter.name: Rainbow Strength
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of rainbows, which depends on the brightness of colors.

parameter.name: Saturation
parameter.description: This variable changes the color Saturation. (Range from 0 to 100)

parameter.name: Value
parameter.description: This variable changes the color Value. (Range from 0 to 100)

parameter.name: Seed
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the noise seed.

parameter.name: Rainbow Error Noise
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of color noise; the lower the value, the lower the probability of display.

parameter.name: Noise Big
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of noise (the larger one)

parameter.name: Noise Small
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of noise (the smaller one).
